workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.21917872862194798 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.3764425791563084 --weight-decay 0.0008274676966282437 --lr 1e-9 --lr-scheduler triangular --min-lr 1e-10 --max-lr 0.0007548103668865826 --lr-period-updates 74333.26159029998 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.14202153493024014 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY
